SELECT NVL(MAX(no)+1, 1) as no FROM reserve_1
INSERT INTO reserve_1(no, fno, id, cin, cout, inwon) VALUES(#{no}, #{fno}, #{id}, #{cin}, #{cout}, #{inwon})
mapper.select: SELECT no, id, cin, cout, inwon, ischeck, TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY"년 "MM"월 "DD"일 "HH24:MI:SS') as dbday, (SELECT c_title FROM camp_1 WHERE camp_1.no = reserve_1.fno) as c_title, (SELECT c_poster FROM camp_1 WHERE camp_1.no = reserve_1.fno) as c_poster, (SELECT c_addr FROM camp_1 WHERE camp_1.no = reserve_1.fno) as c_addr FROM reserve_1 WHERE id=#{id} ORDER BY no DESC
